channel.title: Some no-ip help please
channel.description:
When i had first tried running my server with no-ip i had no luck. Then I used Hamachi and got my server running just fine. Now my Hamachi has stoped working like it wont load up so im resorting back to no-ip. I do believe im doing this right. Please if you notice anything ihav done wrong or somthing i have left out or have any ideas please please post help ;)
first: I went and registered at no-ip and downloaded duc.
second: I added the host
third: I opened and got duc running and put a check next to the box and got smilly face
fourth: I logged into my router
fifth: I port forwarded my 43594 saved i will post some pics of what i have done
[IMG]http://img65.imageshack.us/img65/4299/apic1mk3.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://img235.imageshack.us/img235/8813/apic2ny6.jpg[/img][br][size=1]Posted on: March 13, 2007, 01:33:15 PM[/size][hr]anyone...... :([br][size=1]Posted on: March 13, 2007, 01:36:26 PM[/size][hr]wow this is gay no help :(

item.title: Some no-ip help please
item.description:
@1080 wrote:

for port forwarding it is usually 192.168.0.45

your regular ip has nothign to do with it

Read full topic

item.title: Some no-ip help please
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Not sure about no-ip, it should be fine but I’ve heard that ham is currently down. Btw, do not show your IP address to other people, it can be used to hack you.

Read full topic
